channel.title: Wow... help
channel.description:
Well, In my server, I have a D bow, But it wont show arrows shooting, Instead, It walks up to them, and it just shows them getting hit twice, also, I need help Adding Skills capes into my client. And getting my client like
It shows:
Username: Password: Server IP: Port:
I want it like: Username: Password: (And not have it show the Server IP and port, but have it automattically connect to it) *so they dont have to type it in*.

item.title: Wow... help
item.dc:creator: @Patrickftw Patrickftw
item.description:
@Patrickftw wrote:

Theres a tutorial on your server shit…and let me explain what he meant.

Darkbow trains str/atk, Right? And you run up to the person because of that. I fixed mine so it doesn’t do that though.

Read full topic
